title: Ranked game bug ?
body: So me nd my budd were playing a game and wn it so after that we came to the screen that says waiting for stats with the skip button underneath and after waiting 2 min for stats to show and nothing came we pressed the skip button after taht i was stuck at recon to game that didnt exist for atleast 1 and a half hour and then we coul play again but we didnt gain lp for the game and after i lost the next one i got demoted so i think this is some bullshit and i guess there is no possibility of riot reseting the rank to what it was before the bug occured ?

replies.body: This sounds like a strange issue and I would like to look into this more, but would need some more information.  Can you provide some more details such as when this game occurred or the champions in-game?  Looking at an overview, I was unable to find anything out of the ordinary.  Are you still having this issue?
